notes.data: On a hit, deals an additional 2d4 thunder damage.

Instead of making a ranged weapon attack, the target makes a Dexterity saving throw (DC 8 + DEX modifier). If you are proficient with Assault Rifles, add your proficiency bonus to the DC. On a failed save, the target takes 1d8 thunder damage, or half as much on a successful one.

Somewhat of a relic and hard to come by, the M-7 does not use thermal clips. Instead use a d4 to track the "heat". Every round you fire the weapon, spin down the die 1 face. If you don't fire the weapon, spin the die up one face. This represents the weapon internally cooling off. If you fire the weapon four times in a row, it jams and cannot be used for the rest of this combat.
Custom made for it's owner, when you purchase this weapon, you may choose one of the following:

data: Increase damage of this weapon to d12
Reloading this weapon is a bonus action
+2 to ranged attacks made with the weapon

notes.data: AC +1 when using
+1 to attack rolls
Ignores shields.
Ignores 2 AC.
Missed shots adhere to nearby surfaces and do 1d4 thunder damage instead.

Choose a creature within 60m that is not behind cover. Spend a turn Targeting the creature. The creature can use it's action to make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, they continue being targeted. On a successful save, you may switch to another creature not behind cover, or end the Targeting condition. At the start of your turn, if your have a creature targeted, you launch a missile that deals 8d12 damage. Untargeted creatures within 4m of the blast must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 1d12 damage.

Release a torrent of bullets in a sweeping arc in front of you until the start of your next turn. You are considered to be Targeting until the start of your next turn. Creatures that enter or move within a 10m cone in front of you make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 12d4 shock damage. On a success, a creature takes half damage. Each turn uses a charge.

Sweep fire across the battlefield. Creatures within a 6m cone must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 4d6 damage. You can choose to use 2 weapon charges at once to increase the heat, dealing 4d8 damage instead.

Choose a creature within 60m that you can see and begin Targeting that creature. If you successfully held your targeting for one turn, at the start of your next turn you fire a unique missile at each target. When the missile hits, it deploys 3 shaped charges. The first disrupts any barriers or shields, any barriers or shields the creature has are completely removed. The second charge cripples armor; the creature has their AC reduced by 3 for the remainder of combat. The final charge deal 4d12 damage. The creature can attempt a Constitution saving throw to cut the damage in half.

Spend a round Targeting as you sweep the battlefield for all enemies. At the start of your next turn, choose up to 10 enemy creatures and launch a miniature missile at them, dealing 4d8 damage. You cannot target a creature twice. Each missile used consumes a weapon charge.

Spend a round Targeting, charging up the Cain's core. At the start of your turn, you can choose to continue targeting to increase the power of the blast. You can continue Targeting as long as the Cain has weapon charges left. When you're ready to release the blast, choose a fixed point within 60m. You release a small nuclear explosion in the area. Roll X + 5d12 where X is the number of charges you use multiplied by 2. Any creature within 2m automatically fails the saving throw. Creatures within 10m make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes damage equal to your roll. On a success, a creature takes half damage.

Choose a creature within 60m that is not behind cover. The target creature makes a Dexterity saving throw.  Spend a turn Targeting the creature. The creature can use it's action to make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, they continue being targeted. On a successful save, you may switch to another creature not behind cover, or end the Targeting condition. At the start of your turn, the targeted creature takes 10d12 damage.

Spend a round Targeting a 10m x 20m rectangle, up to 60m away. At the start of your turn, call down an orbital strike. Creatures within the rectangle make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature take 8d12 damage. On a success, a creature takes half damage.
On a hit, the target must make a Constitution saving throw (DC 8) or becomes {stunned}
Deals an additional 2d6 damage to unprotected enemies.
When fired make a single attack roll against all creatures in a 4m cone. All creatures with AC less than the attack are hit.
Instead of making a ranged weapon attack, target creature makes a Dexterity saving throw (DC13). On a successful save, it takes half as much damage.
Ignores 2AC on targets within range.
Ignores half-cover.
On a hit, the target takes an additional 2d6 bleed damage at the start of their turn.
+2 damage to synthorganic enemies
You can reload this weapon as a bonus action.
Ignores half and three-quarter cover. On a hit, if the target is not behing cover, each enemy within a 6m line of the bullet direction also takes damage.
+2 on ranged attack rolls
Versatile: 1d10
When you hit with an attack using this weapon, if the target is {unprotected} it takes an additional 1d6 slashing damage on the start of its next turn.

When you hit with an attack using this weapon, the target is knocked back 4m. In addition, the target must succeed on a Constitution saving throw (DC = 8+Proficiency Bonus+ Strength modifier) or becomes {stunned} until the end of your next turn.
Kenetic energy from successful melee attacks grant a minor biotic boost. When you hit with an attack using this weapon, as a bonus action, you may cast a biotic cantrip.

Kenetic energy from successful melee attacks grant a biotic boost. When you hit with an attack using this weapon, as a bonus action, you may cast a biotic spell or cantrip. This case still consumes a spell slot.

When you hit with an attack using this weapon, the target must succeed on a Constitution saving throw (8 + Proficiency Bonus + Strength or Dexterity modifier, whichever was selected for the attack and damage roll). On a failed save, the target is {poisoned} for 1 min.

When you hit with an attack using this weapon, the target takes and additional 1d4 lightening damage. If the target is maintaining a concentration spell, it automatically fails its saving throw to maintain that spell.
